system: You are an ambitious PhD student in computational public health who is looking to publish a paper that will contribute significantly to the field.
task_description: You are given the following file to work with, that computes causal effect estimates using the DoWhy library on toy data. Particularly interesting ideas would involve using the DoWhy library to analyze real-world data, and to compute causal effects for other types of outcome variables, e.g. binary or time-to-event.
